original_text: But the Holy Spirit will come to you, and he will give you power. The Holy Spirit will make your spirit strong. Then you will tell other people everywhere in the world about me. You will do that in Jerusalem, in Judea, in Samaria and in places far away.’
korean_text: 오직 성령이 너희에게 임하시면 너희가 권능을 받고 예루살렘과 온 유대와 사마리아와 땅 끝까지 이르러 내 증인이 되리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: But the Holy Spirit will come to you
and he will give you power
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그분께서 너희에게 권능을 주실 것이다

sentences.original_text: The Holy Spirit will make your spirit strong
sentences.korean_translation: 성령님께서 너희의 영을 강하게 만드실 것이다

sentences.original_text: Then you will tell other people
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 너희는 다른 사람들에게 말할 것이다

sentences.original_text: everywhere in the world about me
You will do that in Jerusalem
